name: UTCHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask u. t. c. helper for the current UTC time”
”for the offset at Seattle”
”the current time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. t. c. helper
des:
This skill is mainly meant to be a developer tool to assist people who have to think about timezone offsets often. It can also let you know the current UTC time for you to know your current location's offset.

You can also look up the current local time for a location as well.

This skill only accepts location names in English.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
